articles.description: The Department of Transportation (DOTr) said up to three proposals have been submitted for the planned integrated terminal exchange in northern Metro Manila, which it said could be finished by 2028 as it is "desperately needed."

articles.title: Rise in youth gaming addiction due to more enticing games and smart devices, say counsellors
articles.description: Therapists noted a 30 per cent increase in gaming addiction cases since the COVID-19 pandemic, adding that youths make up most of the cases.
articles.content:
